title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 146-2.5 - Hourly rates are required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 146-2.5 - Hourly rates are required

State Regulations

Employees as defined in section
146-3.2
of this Title, other than
commissioned salespersons, shall be paid hourly rates of pay. Employers may not
pay employees on a daily, weekly, salary, piece rate or other non-hourly rate
basis. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
146-2.5

Amended

New

York State Register December 28, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 52, eff. 12/31/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
